segments.text: What are you doing there with your mobile phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , moblogging is a combination of the word ' mobile ' and ' blogging ' . It's another form of blogging . Users can publish blog entries to the web from a mobile phone or other mobile devices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds interesting ! That must be very convenient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're right . I can blog wherever and whenever I'm on the move . It's especially good when I'm on a business trip and my laptop happens to be away from me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if I simply want to write a few words , I'll send it by email or edit it all from the cell phone browser .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if you want to publish some photos ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll shoot some pictures , re-size the images and upload them with text descriptions to my blog .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Moblogging must have done a great favor for habitual bloggers like you .
segments.speaker: S1
